incompletePrompts.description: A list of prompts that are not yet complete for this form.

completedPrompts.description: A list of prompts that have been completed for this form.

FormPromptAssociation.description:
Information about the status of a particular prompt.
Note that this is where we can add additional information about individual responses:
actor, timestamp, and the response itself.

id.description: The id for the prompt. This must be GLOBALLY UNIQUE.

lastModified.description: The last time this prompt was touched for the entity (set, unset)

fieldAssociations.description: Optional information about the field-level prompt associations.

AuditStamp.description: Data captured on a resource/association/sub-resource level giving insight into when that resource/association/sub-resource moved into a particular lifecycle stage, and who acted to move it into that specific lifecycle stage.

time.description: When did the resource/association/sub-resource move into the specific lifecycle stage represented by this AuditEvent.

actor.description: The entity (e.g. a member URN) which will be credited for moving the resource/association/sub-resource into the specific lifecycle stage. It is also the one used to authorize the change.

impersonator.description: The entity (e.g. a service URN) which performs the change on behalf of the Actor and must be authorized to act as the Actor.

message.description: Additional context around how DataHub was informed of the particular change. For example: was the change created by an automated process, or manually.

FormPromptFieldAssociations.description: Information about the field-level prompt associations on a top-level prompt association.

completedFieldPrompts.description: A list of field-level prompt associations that are not yet complete for this form.

incompleteFieldPrompts.description: A list of field-level prompt associations that are complete for this form.

FieldFormPromptAssociation.description:
Information about the status of a particular prompt for a specific schema field
on an entity.

fieldPath.description: The field path on a schema field.

lastModified.description: The last time this prompt was touched for the field on the entity (set, unset)
